alert.note: Alert for Northampton (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Tornado Watch issued May 27 at 11:56AM EDT until May 27 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 276 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 2 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN NORTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN NORTHEAST NORTH CAROLINA NORTHAMPTON IN VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 19 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL VIRGINIA CHESTERFIELD CITY OF COLONIAL HEIGHTS CITY OF RICHMOND HANOVER HENRICO IN EAST CENTRAL VIRGINIA CHARLES CITY ESSEX KING WILLIAM KING AND QUEEN NEW KENT RICHMOND WESTMORELAND IN NORTH CENTRAL VIRGINIA CAROLINE IN SOUTH CENTRAL VIRGINIA CITY OF HOPEWELL CITY OF PETERSBURG PRINCE GEORGE IN SOUTHEAST VIRGINIA CITY OF EMPORIA GREENSVILLE SUSSEX THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF BARNETTS, BEACH, BON AIR, BOTTOMS BRIDGE, BRAYS FORK, BROWNS CORNER, BRYANTOWN, BUFFORD CROSSROADS, BURRUSS CORNER, CARET, CEDAR FORK, CENTER CROSS, CHAMPLAIN, CHESTER, CHESTERFIELD, CLANCIE, CLARESVILLE, COLONIAL BEACH, COLONIAL HEIGHTS, CORBIN, COWIE CORNER, DAWN, DRAGONVILLE, DUNBROOKE, DUNNSVILLE, DURAND, EAGLETOWN, EMPORIA, EMPORIA AIRPORT, EMPORIA RESERVOIR, FORT LEE, GARYSBURG, GASTON, GLEN ALLEN, GREEN PLAIN, GRESSIT, GUM FORKS, HOPEWELL, HOWERTONS, KING AND QUEEN COURT HOUSE, LITTLE PLYMOUTH, MASCOT, MATTAPONI, MEADOWVILLE, MECHANICSVILLE, MIDLOTHIAN, MOSELEY, MOUNTCASTLE, NEW KENT AIRPORT, ORAPAX FARMS, PETERSBURG, QUINTON, RICH SQUARE, RICHMOND, ROXBURY, SANDSTON, TALLEYSVILLE, VULTARE, WAKEFIELD, WARSAW, WAVERLY, WAYSIDE, AND WEST POINT.
